subNodes.conversationText: root
||***ga_fade_from_black-->Float::6    ***gc_false-->NOT::False    ||
Hold.  Paladin, your presence here is not desired.  Return to your village, or feel Bane's wrath.
Your presence here is not desired. The Zhentarim are not free to be this close to Drawn Swords-- or to murder travelers between the Backlands and Sunset Vale.

Murder? We both know that that traveler was dangerous. He killed many of our men. As for your village, rest assured that we have no interest in it.|***ga_journal-->String::Q_MANFRED Int::15 Int::0 Int::0 Int::0 |
[His voice quavering just the slightest.] That traveler was my brother!
Indeed.  You shall pay for your unjust actions in blood, priest.
You did not come here to parley, I see; you came here for revenge.
We are as free to be in Northdark Wood as you. Freer, in fact.  We have force.  You have words.  Now Bane is going to make you eat them.

|***ga_faction_join-->String::gurkik    String::$HOSTILE    ***ga_faction_join-->String::zhent_guard1    String::$HOSTILE    ***ga_faction_join-->String::zhent_guard2    String::$HOSTILE    ***ga_faction_join-->String::zhent_guard3    String::$HOSTILE    ***ga_faction_join-->String::zhent_guard4    String::$HOSTILE    ***ga_destroy-->String::failsafe_gurkin    Int::0    Float::0    ***gurkik_bane-->|
What do you say to that, Banite?
[Draw your weapon grimly.]

[After a few hours of hiking through the autumn landscape of Northdark Wood, you hear the sound of rustling leaves and the clank of arms ahead of you.]|***ga_local_int-->String::gurkiepok String::1 String::gurkik |
